pkgmetadata.longdescription: Discrete Composite Distributions with Pareto Tails // Contains the probability density function, cumulative distribution function, quantile function, and random number generator for composite and discrete composite distributions with Pareto tails. The detailed description of the methods and the applications of the methods can be found in Bowen Liu, Malwane M.A. Ananda (2023) arXiv:2309.16443.
